channel.title: Where and how do i add a shop / fix a shop
channel.description:
i wanna add a skill cape shop
[code]shop = 61 Skill Cape Shop 2 2 14073 100 14076 100 14079 100 14082 100 14085 100 14088 100 14094 100 14103 100 14109 100 14124 100 14127 100 14133 100 14112 100 14121 100[/code]
i know where the shops are listed in shop java buuuut if i add this where am i supose to find the shop?
and my richard guy at edge makes u lag out wen u trade him :(

item.title: Where and how do i add a shop / fix a shop
item.dc:creator: @Olli3 Olli3
item.description:
@Olli3 wrote:

Well , just go to Npc.cfg and look for the name of the NPC that sells the skill capes , get his ID , go to autospawn.cfg
search his ID and look at the Coordinates ,change them to the desired locationâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Where and how do i add a shop / fix a shop
